item.title: Teltonika Analog Sensor Connect
item.description: How to connect Analog Fuel Sensor to FMB125 device. # Step 1 - Preparation # Ensure wiring Fuel Sensor to AIN1 signal of FMB125. Ensure Power and SIM is normal. Set IP, Port for the device sending to GoTrack Platform Step 2 - Setup Analog Input # Check Analog 1 value is available on the Platform by creating a sensor. If the value is not available, send GPRS command to enable Analog Input Parameter:
